data.name: Relaxing Kite
data.detailed_description:
Are we going to fly a kite? Sure! But without leaving home.

Take on the role of a character who tries to keep the kite in the air as long as possible. Watch out for obstacles that will make this task difficult for you. If you stay in the air longer, you will unlock exciting new maps, original characters, and above all, wonderful-looking kites.

It is not the end! The game has a very advanced system of adjusting the difficulty level to the user. This allows you to enjoy the game even more. It won't be too hard or too easy.

Relaxing Kite is a game designed for all people who dream of a moment of peace and relaxation. The game is characterized by an extremely pleasant control mechanism, smooth animations, and brilliant graphics and sound
data.about_the_game:
Are we going to fly a kite? Sure! But without leaving home.

It is not the end! The game has a very advanced system of adjusting the difficulty level to the user. This allows you to enjoy the game even more. It won't be too hard or too easy.

Relaxing Kite is a game designed for all people who dream of a moment of peace and relaxation. The game is characterized by an extremely pleasant control mechanism, smooth animations, and brilliant graphics and sound
data.short_description: Wait! Pause for a moment and immerse yourself in some relaxing entertainment. Sit back, put on your headphones, and relax. The unique audiovisual experience will allow you to finally cut yourself off from everything and enjoy the game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 32 bit
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz (Intel Celeron / AMD Athlon 64 x2)
  • Memory: 768 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon or GeForce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
